description: High key-person dependency on the single developer with specialized skills for DirectX/Vortice.Windows programming. Loss of this individual could halt progress on the core DICOM viewer.
mitigation_strategy: 1. Mandate pair programming between Graphics Developer and Fullstack Developer for all viewer-related work. 2. Require comprehensive documentation and architectural diagrams for the rendering pipeline.
contingency_plan: Identify and pre-vet external contractors with .NET and DirectX expertise for rapid engagement if needed.
monitoring_trigger: The primary graphics developer is unavailable for >3 consecutive days without a trained backup available.

description: Deployment failures at customer sites due to complex environmental prerequisites (PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, firewall rules). This creates a high support burden and relies on a single developer for expertise.
mitigation_strategy: 1. Develop a standalone "Environment Pre-flight Check" utility. 2. Create an exhaustive Deployment Guide with detailed troubleshooting sections.
contingency_plan: Allocate budget to hire a part-time DevOps contractor during the deployment phase (Sprints 5-7).
monitoring_trigger: Internal test deployments on clean VMs fail more than 10% of the time.
